NBA Injuries

Returns information about NBA injured players

get_nba_player_injuries(filter_returning_today = T)

Arguments

filter_returning_today

if TRUE filter players returning today

Value

a `data_frame`

See also

Other players: get_players_bios, get_seasons_metrics_league_leaders, get_teams_players_seasons_summary_stats

Examples

# NOT RUN {
get_nba_player_injuries()
# }
